<title>Live in New York City (DVD) | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="This two-DVD set features the Emmy-award winning HBO broadcast from the final two shows of the E Street Band reunion tour from Madison Square Garden." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:title" content="Live in New York City (DVD)" />
<meta property="og:description" content="This two-DVD set features the Emmy-award winning HBO broadcast from the final two shows of the E Street Band reunion tour from Madison Square Garden. A second disc compiles an additional 11 previously unseen songs from the shows. The set also features a documentary with live clips and interviews with the members of the E Street Band." />

yoast_head_json.title: Live in New York City (DVD) | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: This two-DVD set features the Emmy-award winning HBO broadcast from the final two shows of the E Street Band reunion tour from Madison Square Garden.
yoast_head_json.og_description: This two-DVD set features the Emmy-award winning HBO broadcast from the final two shows of the E Street Band reunion tour from Madison Square Garden. A second disc compiles an additional 11 previously unseen songs from the shows. The set also features a documentary with live clips and interviews with the members of the E Street Band.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: This two-DVD set features the Emmy-award winning HBO broadcast from the final two shows of the E Street Band reunion tour from Madison Square Garden. A second disc compiles an additional 11 previously unseen songs from the shows. The set also features a documentary with live clips and interviews with the members of the E Street Band.
